It's my mission to work with people, brands and startups who exist to make the world a better place

Over the last ten years I have helped independent authors, healthcare suppliers, charities and special needs product manufacturers find their voice on the web and other digital platforms.

If you or your brand exists to do things that matter, to improve the world around us, to do better, then I'd love to hear from you.

LUHA°

Design • Build • Craft CMS & Rails Integration

Redefining fitness beyond lifting weights, oversized builds and supplements. LUHA° is for real people and run by real people helping you achieve your fitness goals.

Together with the LUHA° team we built a custom app alongside Craft CMS to connect customers and personal trainers.

www.luha.co

Lagom Magazine

Design • Development • Craft CMS Integration

The independent print publishing industry is thriving. Lagom Magazine is one of its finest products demonstrating a quality aesthetic backed up by compelling and inspiring content.

Alongside Elliot Jay Stocks I helped design, build and integrate with Craft CMS for Lagom's online presence.

www.readlagom.com

Niice

Design • Development • Rails Customisation

Empowering creative teams to collaborate closely and do their best work. With Niice we are aiming to shape the feedback process in a way that works for clients and designers alike.

Working closely with Chris Armstrong and the development team, I have been working on the user interface and user experience of Niice - a custom app built from the ground up.

www.niice.co

The Logbook

An infrequent, thoughfully compiled newsletter for makers, thinkers and fellow doers.
